NavigationCurrententrychange_event.summary: The currententrychange event of the interface is fired when the has changed.

remarks.para: This event fires after the navigation is committed, meaning that the visible URL has changed and the update has occurred. It is useful for migrating from usage of older API features like the or events.

-Modern client-side routing: the Navigation API

-Domenic Denicola's Navigation API live demo
